content: What's the maximum number of lithology types in an log?
The maximum number of lithology types that can be recorded in a log is 450.
How many tracks can you define in one ODF?
The maximum number of tracks that can be specified within a single ODF file is 200.
How many curve shades can I create?
You can create 250 curve shades.
How many curves can I load in one go?
What the maximum number of headers I can display in my log?
You can load up to 450 curves per data file.
The maximum number of headers you can display in your log is 50.
How many tables can I have in my log?
You can have up to 50 tables in a log.
What's the maximum number of characters in a single text entry?
The maximum number of characters in a single text entry is 32000.
How many symbols can I have in the plot at any one time?
You can have up to 10,000 symbols in a plot at any one time.
How many scales can I define?
You can define up to 23 scales.
What is the maximum number of data files I can load?
An unlimited number of data files.
